source_reference.text: 9 Christian Relationship Tips I Learned After 9 Years of Marriage (Video by ApplyGodsWord_MarkBallenger)

content_summary:
For my 9 year anniversary I wrote this article about 9 things I've learned about marriage. In this video I share those Christian relationship tips.
